title: SET_VEHICLE_AUDIO_BODY_DAMAGE_FACTOR
content:
0x01BB4D577D38BD9E0xE81FAC68// SetVehicleAudioBodyDamageFactor
void SET_VEHICLE_AUDIO_BODY_DAMAGE_FACTOR(Vehicle vehicle, float intensity);Parameters:vehicle: Vehicle to modifyintensity: A value 0.0 - 1.0. Higher the value, the more likely the vehicle is to make the sound while deceleratingVehicle will make a 'rattling' noise when decelerating
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_AUDIO_BODY_DAMAGE_FACTOR
SetVehicleAudioBodyDamageFactor(vehicle, 0.0)
